name: daMage
description:
daMage is short game made for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

You play as a mage crawling through a dungeon in search of an answer to your...condition. You have a twin that can be spawned with Space key. Shoot and zap your way to the treasure!

WASD or arrows: movement
Left click: shoot
Right click or Space: mirror image
Mouse: aim
Esc or P: pause and change these keys

Made by:

Carl Summers

Gabriel Andrade

Song Yang

Assets used were made by Robert (https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset)
